snippet: Despite his weak showing in Nevada, Newt Gingrich says he is well-placed to do well in the March 6 "Super Tuesday" contests.
abstract: Despite his weak showing in Nevada, Newt Gingrich says he is well-placed to do well in the March 6 "Super Tuesday" contests.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON -- Newt Gingrich on Sunday brushed aside his second consecutive lopsided loss, saying that by the time "Super Tuesday" rolled around on March 6, his struggling campaign would find itself in "much more favorable territory."
